options.tooltip: You're not ready. Hope for mercy.
Take the new recruit under your wing.
Let them figure it out themselves.

events.title: Baggage Inspection
events.setup:
The quartermaster runs a hand through your pack during muster. His eyes linger on something that shouldn't be there. For a moment, the air is tense.

Then he closes the pack, gives you a small nod, and moves on.

options.tooltip: The quartermaster is doing you a favor. Best not to make it awkward.
options.outcome: Some things are better left unspoken. You owe him one, and you both know it.

events.title: Contraband Discovered
events.setup:
The quartermaster's hand stops in your pack. He pulls out an item and raises an eyebrow.

"This doesn't belong to a soldier of your rank," he says quietly. "I can overlook it... for a price. Or we can do this by the book."

options.tooltip: Use Charm to negotiate. 60+ auto-success, 30-59 roll, <30 auto-fail.
options.outcome: The quartermaster pockets your coin and slides the item back into your pack. "Next time, be more careful." The price of discretion.
options.outcome_failure: The quartermaster shakes his head. "Not enough. And now you've insulted me." He takes the item and marks something in his ledger. This will come back to haunt you.

options.text: [Roguery 40+] Smuggle it past while he's distracted.
options.tooltip: Risky. 30% chance of discovery. Failure means double penalties.
options.outcome: A well-timed distraction, a sleight of hand, and the item vanishes back into your gear. The quartermaster never notices.
options.outcome_failure: He catches your hand mid-motion. His expression hardens. "Trying to make a fool of me?" The item is confiscated, and this goes in the report. You've made an enemy today.

options.text: Hand it over. Accept the consequences.
options.tooltip: Item confiscated. Fine applied. +2 Scrutiny. Honest, at least.
options.outcome: You hand over the item without protest. The quartermaster notes it in his ledger. A fine will be deducted from your next pay. At least you kept your dignity.

events.title: Contraband Seized
events.setup:
The quartermaster yanks an item from your pack, his face cold.

"Above your station," he says flatly. "This is confiscated. And there will be a fine." No negotiation. No mercy. His ledger is already open.

options.tooltip: Item taken. Fine applied. +2 Scrutiny. The price of getting caught.
options.outcome: The item disappears into the quartermaster's custody. The fine will hurt, but there's nothing to be done. Next time, you'll be more careful.

options.tooltip: Won't change anything. Makes things worse.
options.outcome: Surprisingly, the quartermaster pauses. "Fine. Keep it. But you owe me." A small victory, but you've put yourself on his list.
options.outcome_failure: The quartermaster's eyes narrow. "Noted." He takes the item anyway and adds an extra note to his ledger. You've made things worse.
